  <b>Proceedings</b>

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

A collection of presentations from the workshop will appear in the mODa proceedings, a special issue of [Statistical Papers](https://www.springer.com/journal/362) edited by [Dave Woods](https://statsdavew.github.io), [Stefanie Biedermann](https://www.open.ac.uk/people/sb42774) and [Chiara Tommasi](https://www.unimi.it/en/ugov/person/chiara-tommasi). 

Currently, most papers can be found in the [online first](https://link.springer.com/journal/362/online-first) list on the journal website.
